attributes.action: Demolish the Former Unisys Towers, Brent, N.London and make an attraction.
attributes.additional_details: They should reconstruct it into something which might attract people into wembley because currently many people go past there and they see 2 ugly towers. So if they make an attraction more people will come there.
attributes.background: The Former Unisys Towers. ruin the image of brent as they are near a major junction from which many people enter wembley to visit the stadium and London designer outlet. The 2 towers look really ugly and no action has been taken against it. This is why i suggest that they should be reconstructed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
